about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an exciting new adventure with the "Black Hole Void: Survive The Hole" DLC! Experience a challenging new game mode where you must escape the all-consuming Black Hole and stay alive. This expansion brings new mechanics, exciting challenges, and an additional leaderboard for even more competitive spirit.

New Game Mode: Survive The Hole
In "Survive The Hole," you fight for your survival as a gigantic Black Hole relentlessly approaches you. Your task is to survive as long as possible by constantly moving and avoiding the increasing speed of the Hole.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Escape Experience: The Black Hole gets faster over time, making the escape increasingly challenging. React quickly and keep your nerves to avoid being consumed.

  • Safe Zones: At regular intervals, you encounter Safe Zones where you can briefly find safety. Use these moments to catch your breath and plan your next strategy.

  • New Leaderboard: Compete with players worldwide on the new leaderboard for the "Survive The Hole" mode. Show how long you can escape the Black Hole and secure your place among the top survival artists.

  • Play as a Human: In this mode, you don't control the Black Hole but a brave human fighting for survival. This new perspective brings a refreshing change to the gameplay and challenges your reflexes and tactical skills.

short_description: Black Hole Void: Survive The Hole DLC Experience a thrilling escape adventure, improve your skills in the Upgrade Shop, and compete for the top of the new leaderboard. Are you ready to escape the Black Hole and prove your survival skills?
